snippet: The driver lost control of the minibus and it skidded off a highway, plunged down a gorge and then caught fire on the way in Madhya Pradesh State.
abstract: More than 20 people die and at least 10 more are injured when minibus skids off highway into gorge and catches fire in India's Madhya Pradesh state.
lead_paragraph: The driver lost control of the minibus and it skidded off a highway, plunged down a gorge and then caught fire on the way in Madhya Pradesh State.

headline.main: Bus Crash in Central India Kills More Than 20
headline.print_headline: Asia; India: 20 Die as Bus Plunges Into Gorge
